content.detailedDescription:
In was at the air show in fort smith arkansas as as the thunderbirds were about to take off i was snapping pictures and when i checked the pictures there is an odd disc shaped object above the jets

i can't get the picture to attach but i can email it if you provide an email
content.summary: I took a picture at an airshow and caught it

content.detailedDescription: I was standing behind my work taking a break when my coworker said whats that and pointed up. upon first oberservation, i thought it was a flock of gulls or pelicans. then it went over the street and the lights from the lightpoles lit up the underside of the craft. we could see it plain as day. it was completely silent with no lights visible. id estimate its speed at about 20mph. it was flying from south to north between the ocean and the intracoastal waterway. once it was out of the reflection from the light, it vanished into the night. had we not been looking up we would have never known it was there. it is definately something that ive never seen except in scifi movies.
content.summary: 40-50' wingtip to wingtip. observered 3 round depressions on vessel. silent and slowwww. no lights at all. other witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
On a saturday night i awoke about two a.M and went outside.Standing in the clear summer night when something in my mind told me look up.
and there i saw a small white light in the sky to my left and it proceeded in my direction at an angle.One it got close i could see it was huge.Like a football field.Then it stopped right in front above me.I was afraid so i stood still and it just hovered there quietly.In my mind i started saying "please god don't y'all bother me right now.As soon as i thought that it started moving away slowly in the opposite direction.It got smaller and smaller until it was gone.
content.summary: I witnessed in july/august '91or'92 a huge oval white light hovering over me.It stopped for a few minutes then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 10:12 pm local time, i noticed what appeared to be an extremely bright star to the northwest, north of the summit of mt. chocorua and at approximately 20 deg. above my position. since we live in a dark area and there are a number of bright magnitude stars/planets that are visible from our location to the western sky, i initially discounted the sighting, but realized that i observed this object with the light on in the bathroom which indicates the intensity of the object's light. 

shortly thereafter, shutting the inside light off, i went back to the same window and further noticed that it was completely  overcast, but the moon's light could be been seen dimly through the thinner parts of the overcast. i further observed the intensely lighted object as the only lighted object in the sky. upon a more focused look at the object, which was also confirmed from my son, there were color changes from red to green and yellow and white along the perimeter of the object. 

the object wobbled left and right and up and down but made no other direct-line motion and continued to be extremely bright. i don't suspect that this was an civilian or military aircraft, due to my extensive experience in aviation.

at approximately 10:30 pm after observing the object for about 15-18 minutes, the object began to slowly dim and completely extinguished itself over approximately the next 30 seconds. no further sighting(s) was observed.
content.summary: Extremely bright multi-color wobbling ufo

content.detailedDescription: It was on 19 jun 91 around 10:50 when i was asked by a friend of mine to borrow a stick of butter.  i left my house immediately afterwards to meet her at her back porch, which was only a house away from hers, to deliver the stick of butter.  once there, i tossed the stick of butter up to her and began a conversation.  as i stood below her porch on the sidewalk talking to her, a neighbors dog (bentley) began to bark....I tried to hush the dog, but he just kept barking.......I couldn't tell if he was barking at me for attention, or if it was something else.  all of a sudden, it got eerily quiet, and i noticed that the dog was no longer barking....And had gone under the neighbor's porch....But i could see he was peering out from the darkness under the porch....And that's when bam....The brightest light i've ever seen just suddenly appeared directly above us! i asked my girlfriend if she could tell what it was, because she was so much closer to it than i, but she stated the light was too bright to look at....But we both continued to try and figure out what it was.  but then i noticed that the leaves on the tree, directly under the light, weren't moving.....And there was no sound coming from the object...It was a stillness i've never witnessed before......Not in "that" area which i lived at the time, the street was usually littered with crackheads and dope boys, but not on this night.....No one, i mean absolutely no one was around....And it spooked me so i ran.........And didn't stop until i got in my house!!  my friend and i never spoke of this again because we didn't think anyone would believe our story.  but i did tell my husband 10 years later....His response was...."i see them all the time out on sr 40 going to work (towards columbus, oh), their always over hovering above the cornfields and empty fields!
content.summary: Encountered ufo sighting while talking with a friend that was on her back porch

content.detailedDescription: I was at home the night of this event, which was located directly next to the united states naval academy. it was around 8:30 pm in late sept. 2007. as i sat outside on my third floor balcony relaxing, i noticed something moving in the neighbor's garden/small vineyard that i could see clearly below. the plants seemed to be giving off an energy and moving but there was no wind. i stood up to see what was going on and suddenly i realized that there was something hovering over the garden that seemed to be camoflauged with it. the round object was about 25ft in diameter and seemed to have a surface that i can only describe as like that of a stingray.  a mist seemed to emit from the underside of the disc. suddenly i was dizzy and felt sedated. (let me assure you that i had not been drinking, nor was i taking any kind of medicine or drug.) as i sat back down in this physical state, the object then rose to house top level then shot off into air so fast, that when i blinked it was so far up in the sky it moved off out of sight.  i didn't know what to do and i was so tired that i just sat there staring in disbelief.  the sedated feeling kind of made me second guess everything and made me think i had been seeing things so i did nothing.  it was been nagging at me ever since and wanted to finally tell my story.
content.summary: I witnessed a ufo hovering over a neighbor's garden near the usna, felt sedated and saw it shoot off into space.

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking pic of clouds and blew the pic up and seen all these strange objects the pic will have to be blown up to see it
content.summary: I didn't even now it was there till i looked at my pic

content.detailedDescription: We were out camping just out side hemsworth nown as springis we were stood on top of the banking for the railway suronded by trees as i looked towords my friend i saw the light just over his shoulder.At first i fort it was a helicopter but ther was no noise within a minit it was right above us 40-50 feet flying paralel with the railway line still making no noise at this point we could see it was not a helicopter it was a black dimond with a blue green light on each point after a few minits it was out of sight behind the trees.
content.summary: Black dimond shape with lights on all 4 points.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car at 6:30am driving my kids to school.  the sky was clear (no clouds) any airplanes in the sky were leaving trails.  this object had no trails.  it was such a profound and unusual shape (u shape/teardrop shape) to be hovering in the sky.  as soon as i saw it - i stopped my car in the middle of the road to take pictures and video.  i kept squinting my eyes to make sure i knew what i was seeing.  it was surreal.  the object appeared to be moving away, but very slowly, no quick movements.  i am submitting this within an hour of witnessing this to make sure i get all of the details clear.
content.summary: Saw a

content.detailedDescription: On 4/25/2015 at approximately 1:00am central standard time i witnessed a triangular ufo with 6 distinct lights underneath the craft. the lights led to a point to the tip of the craft with a larger light directly in the middle of the craft. this craft was so large it took up my entire field of view at a 45 degree angle. it is the largest flying craft i have ever seen. easily larger than 3 747s put together. it wasn't the actual sighting that spooked me it was the fact that it was flying so low and there was absolutely no sound whatsoever.  i know 1000% this was something that is unexplainable.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo with 6 distinct lights underneath moving from south to north at 1:00 am on 4/25/2015

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my break sitting in my car in the parking lot at the above address when i noticed a bright light moving at a high rate of speed from my right to my left, all planes come in from my left and travel to my right, accross the sky. my first thought was a shooting star, but the light was to low and to bright. as the light moved past i was looking for blinking lights but there were none. my window was also down and there was no sound. the object appeard to turn south at a 90 degree and shoot off. the light did not diminish but father it moved away it dimmed. no trail or change of color or shape was noticed. there were no red or green wing lights observed as would be on a plane. the distance coverd by object would have taken a plane 20-30 sec to cover, the object coverd it in 2-3 sec. the object did appear to be lower than comerical air craft as the planes are landing in philly airport. there is a national guard stationin newcastle about the same didtance away from me. i also thought it might be a helocopter but no sound and absent blinking lights and the speed of the light. as for how i felt ..Well it was awsome and exciting not sure what it was but never seen anything like it before. i'm out there most nights dur to working 3rd shift and have seen alot of airplanes and helocopters and this was non of them.
content.summary: Object moved accross the sky extremly fast, i have observed planes cover the same distance with in 20-30 sec this bject moved the same distance in aprox 2-3 sec then sped off on a rt angle moving south at unkown speed and disapeard in the distsance.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend took this photo of the horse farm .. she attempted to zoom in on the horse statue that only has 3 legs .. and noticed this dark triangle close to the farm. so she sent me the pic.. and asked me what i thought ..Beats me.. so i submit these photos to the pros  for scrutiny and investigation .. side note .. she said the giant cloud above the farm was circle shaped and still..
content.summary: Noticed  it in a photo my girlfriend took with her i-phone.😳

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed ufo over lake norman/ troutman, nc. first witnessed ufo looking out over the lake from back porch. at first glance thought it was a star or planet but after a few minutes it was something else. it was at a pretty far distance but had the shadow of a very large triangle or other shape. at one point it looked like it separated into different lights but came back together. the whole experience was amazing. me and another person who also saw it could not believe it and watched it for almost an hour. the lights faded and got brighter a few times. time seemed to change and it seemed to be sending out a signal that was effecting electricity. also looked to be moving very fast beyond the ufo.  it moved from side to side and up and down and toward the end seemed to just fade out but came back again. i could hear sounds in the woods. i was a little scared, excited, but calm and thankful to have seen it. after 45 min watching it intensely we went back inside because it was getting cold outside and it seemed to be fading out.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo over lake norman, nc. it was a mesmerizing and exciting experience.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Heading home from work this evening roughly 10:20pm i noticed a large bright white light in the sky. at first glance it appeared to be a star but did not have light emitting from all directions, only just below the object. as i began to take more notice the object began to move west bound along with the flow of traffic, to the right of the horizon. it could not have been more than a hundred feet above the trees parallel to the hwy. its large bright light from below began to dim and surge in and out of brightness for the next minute before completely disappearing, then re-appearing not two seconds later to the left of the horizon. im now passing rt29 towards the mall in columbia and the object begins to climb towards passing aircraft. im now seeing the object in and out of the passing trees but it is still to the right of the horizon. the object is almost out of view before another bright white light surfaces above it now and is what appeared to be hovering in place (now passing under rt108 @ roughly 10:35) surging the same as the previous encounter. both objects now began climbing and were in plain view, they began to dim simultaneously before cutting out completely and disappearing. i made sure to take note that neither object had blinking or colored lights, and that a small dome shape was slightly visible at the top of each object. no noted noise from either as they were too far for me to hear. pinned location is where the encounter began, dayton area is where it ended. no lost time. just unexplained phenomenon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 bright star like objects observed moving through columbia sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the second floor deck of a beach rental home around 9:10 am when i observed a large cigar shaped object moving north to south about 10 degrees above the water near the horizon (3.4 miles). it caught my eye because it was dark gray and i was looking at the light gray/white clouds at the horizon. i was sitting with two other people and immediately said "what is that?" because it was so large, moving quite fast and had no visible lights on it. the two other people immediately turned to look, but it had gone through some clouds and was not visible. they turned away resuming their conversation while i continued to keep my eyes focused along the horizon. a few seconds later i could see it again, but it was flying through the low level clouds/fog and would disappear a few seconds at a time. the two others turned again as they could see i was tracking it with my eyes. i then point my finger at the object and tracked it so they could see it, but by the time their eyes focused on the horizon, it disappeared in the clouds.  i never saw it after that. 

the reason i think it wasn't an aircraft was the speed, the size and the fact there were no wing lights or other lights on it. another reason, which is hard to verbalize, was the way it moved so smoothly. aircraft can look jerky at that distance and appear fuzzy around the edges due to the movement of the wings as it cuts through the air. the craft i observed glided through the air as if there were no atmosphere around it. again, it is very hard to put into words how easily it traveled at a high speed. 

i've tried to determine the size but i can't accurately measure it. perhaps if i describe it, you can estimate it. i know the distance was around 3.4 miles as it appeared to be at the horizon. i placed a ruler about five inches from my face and the object measured slighly less than a half inch. 

the total time of observation was 30-45 seconds.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo moving in a straight line n to s 10 degrees above the ocean around 3.4 miles away

content.detailedDescription: Three perfectly circular, white lights in the formation of a triangle hovered over the pensacola bay. i saw them driving home from work on a night in the late spring or early summer in 2013, as i was going over the 3 mile bay bridge. there didn't seem to be any craft that they were attached to, and in the space between all three lights, i could see stars and the night sky...So they didn't seem to be attached, other than for the fact that they remained perfectly spaced. i saw them and thought they might have been lights of an aircraft, because the nas was on the other side of the bay from where i was driving, and the lights would have been between me and the base; however, they began to spin as they hung in the air, as if they *were* attached to a craft that was spinning, because they stayed equally spaced from each other. then, the lights shot into the sky, up, not toward any particular n/s/e/w direction. they were gone in the blink of an eye.
content.summary: Lights hovering over pensacola bay

content.detailedDescription: Wow i was outside smoking a cigarette. noticed a huge light that i've never seen, i look at the sky always because i live in a place where visibility is beautiful and i like the view.  i noticed the orb changing color from bright whit to a blue then an orange glow, then watched it make an extremely weird direction change just to come back and hover in original spot. i asked my mother and father to confirm i'm not seeing things and they immediately said they saw the same without me having to point it out to them i'm 100% positive it was a star, plane, or anything of that nature and to get a perspective of movement we witnessed a plane flying in same area with the normal white to red lights to assure us it was a plane. then we witnessed a helicopter flying in same direction but herd the helicopter so again confirmed it wasn't a helicopter.  it made us feel uneasy because we are not ones to believe in something that is unexplainable to us. we are not your ufo typical believers so it is completely out of character to try to find out how to report so making this sighting and report is something we felt needed to be explained. we lost sight of object because of a huge direction change from spot position to a climb in altitude.  then regained visual 10-15mins later with it"( orb) but this time having a second object similar to first but smaller under the original object which confirmed our skeptisism that we previously had with all out panic and that the object not only returned but this time it had not only returned but it had another object (orb) returned with it!!!! omg!!! so weird.  sorry about some of my misspelled words or run on sentences but i am just lost for words on how or what to do.  the 2nd object seemed to join the first like for lack of terminology docked or combined with the first and continued to hover for to be exact 47 mins until both climes so fast so far that we lost sight.
content.summary: A glowing orb. changing colos then moving quickly then coming to original spot

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving north on se 22hd heading towards hartford.  as i rounded a curve i noticed an object just above the tree line.  the object was glowing white-hot.  it reminded me of high-hat cymbals from a drum kit.   at first i thought it was a reflection from something, but i didn't see anything around that it was reflecting off.  what drew my attention was that it was the brightest thing in the sky.  like i said, it looked like it was white-hot.  as i approached the stop sign at hartford it seemed the object headed straight away from me and disappeared.  it kept getting smaller and smaller until it was out of sight.  what makes me think it was a reflection is that i was descending a hill while it looked like sped away from us.
content.summary: White-hot disclike object  hovered then headed north and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 31year army veteran. i was employed as armed security in qatar. i have years of security experience. at 7:40pm, 27 april 2015 i observed a black lear type jet flying nw at a low altitude.  at this time the sun has yet to set behind the mountains to the west.  distance from my location the jet was about 2 to 3 miles.  the strange thing about this occurance is that in the 4 corners region of nm there is no airport, at best there is a small plane airstrip(no buildings not even afuel truck) in shiprock. due west of our home there is a mountain range that paralels hwy 491 and the arizona border.

 previously, i observed an aircraft flying north, parallel to the mountain range, below the top of the range. admmittedly this isn't a saucer/triangle observation with greys doing biological sampling. however, black helicopters and men in  black are associated with ufos. additionally this part of the u.S. has a huge reputation as a ufo hotspot. was it military? probably. having been stationed on ft hood i have been exposed to spy planes. they have markings but they aren't all black. 

is this noteworthy? i don't know.....Maybe.
content.summary: Black jet, lear

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving a meeting in minneapolis - a big old church building.  i drove around the church to get better access to the road i needed to get on.  i turned onto a road that probably was the west side of the church.  i noticed in the sky a glowing round pulsating glow.  it was very odd looking - not like a plane or helicopter.  i parked the car on the side of the street to watch it.  another person came out of the building as well and commented my watching it and mentioned it looked like a plane on fire.  there was no sound, it was going slowly and appeared round.  eventually, it slowly flew further and further away until it became a dot in the sky.  one aspect of it was that it was glowing and seemed to have some fire-like motion on it.  i could not see details as it was glowing. 

i knew it was not a plane or helicopter because there was no sound.  i do not think it was a satellite because it was too low and i have seen those before and they do not look like what i saw tonight.  it was too big to be a drone. besides, a drone wouldn't fly that high and they make sound, from what i know.  it couldn't have been a falling star or meteorite because it was flying at an even slow pace.

i took pictures of it with my phone, but they are not so great.  one picture at least shows the color of it when i first saw it.
content.summary: I observed a round glowing, slow moving object in the sky at night.  it was clearly not a plane, helicopter or drone as there was no sound.  too slow to be a falling star or meteorite.  it was flying low enough for me to notice.

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 1740 and my spouse and i were out for a bike ride. we were waiting for the crosswalk light to change so that we could proceed across the street.  we were looking up at the moon and noticed this object.  we weren't sure if it was a plane at first,and it didn't look like any we had seen before. it appeared as if it slowly moving then hovered. it shot straight up in the air, and back down again, we looked at each other as if we were unsure if we had actually seen what we did. we watched it for another minute and it shot to the right and then straight a head and out of our vision.  it was shiny with what looked like blue on it.  there was no sound, no emissions.  it lasted for about 1 or 2 minutes.  we couldn't believe we were seeing this in broad daylight.  i went to take a picture with my phone, but by the time i got it out, the object was too far away, and it was gone!  we were in awe and in disbelief, we had to look at each other and ask each other if we were really seeing what we were seeing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unusual occurance in broad day light.

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this on april 27 2015, starting time 6:30pm.........

 so after a night of tv shows on the dvr, my sister and i had to go the gas station for cigarettes. this is like 12:50am, im pretty sure of the time and you'll see why. we exited the door, now my house sits up pretty high. there are 16 steps to walk down  b4 u reach the sidewalk so my view of the sky is pretty good on a clear night. so we walk to the car that's across the street. the car is parked so that the passenger side is on the other side walk. ok, my sister's the driver. so we're walking to the car, backs to the house, i go to open the door and see it streaking above my house for just about 3 seconds. i ask to my sister, "did you see that" she didn't because her back is towards the house and she's opening the door.    the best way i can describe is that it looked like a upside down trident, but more crescent moon like. it had a small tail to it. i lost site of it because it went behind my house. so we drive to the gas station, and on our way back stop pass a friends house. she goes in, i'm sitting in the car with no music so i can hear and see anyone maybe creeping up to the car tryna carjack us being the neighborhood i live in. i started to hear propellers in the distance coming so i looked at the clock and it was 1:03am. then i turned around in my seat bcuz now i can really hear it now. look out the back window and see the helicopter lights fly by. bout 2 minutes after my sister comes out, get in the car and we go back home. i tell my sister  "why when u was in the house a helicopter was riding this way" and i pointed in the direction it was going. we get back to the house, i tell my brother what happened. about 15 minutes total, from us coming back in the door, all of a sudden we all heard like 2 helicopters flying by. i said " see y'all, i told u i seen a helicopter when we left", we all jus listened to them fly by. so i asked my brother is there some way i can find out if someone reported seeing anyanything. he gave me this website and here i am.
content.summary: Walking to the car, clear night, out of nowhere streaks across sky, ten minutes later helicopter fly in same direction

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my lower level patio having a cigarette and decided to take a couple pictures of the city. i snapped 2 photos and looked up to notice a light sitting above the city. i noticed it wasn't moving so i snapped a few more photos of it then went to turn my video on but by that time it was gone.All pictures are taken within 30s.
content.summary: Object appeared out of nowhere. hovered for appoximately 30s then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
1. was in osceola, at cloud florida at about 7-8 pm. just got dark out
2. i noticed a very bright red object hovering over and flying across where a palm tree was.
3. i immediatly knew it was a ufo. i never seen nothing like it. 
4. it was a circular object, that was pulsing bright red, made no noise. it was close enough to hear sound, but this thing was silent. under the red light, i can see a small blinking light that was white, but the photo did not capture it. it was hovering across and disappeared. 
6. other people were scared, but i was in awe. i was so shocked to witness something that is always talked about, a ufo. 
7. after the video was taken it hovered behind some tress, as i walked around the trees.. it was gone. 


i'm 100% this thing was from another planet.
content.summary: It was a pulsing red light that was very bright red. the picture does not show how red it was in person. in the photo it comes out bright orange, but in person it looked much more red. it had no sound, and hovered acros.

content.detailedDescription:
Today april 26 2015 i saw a bright star like object moving slowly to medium speed and kind quietly across the horizon, because it was far from my house. i was playing soccer on my backyard when i saw a very bright star like object moving kinda slowly to medium across the horizon in one straight direction. and then there was a grey cloud (normal cloud) and it disappear when the thing enter it. then, i went to get the binoculars to see if i can see another one and i went outside and like 3 to 5 minutes after the "thing" has disappear, it appears from nowhere a helicopter really black and with a big red light on the end of the helicopter on the back, up of the propeller, because i saw the helicopter on the binocular and i notice that the helicopter was heading towards the direction of the "thing" that disappear minutes ago.

notes: 

- i notice it was a helicopter, because of the sound that normally do a helicopter.

- i didn't have a camera on hand :( , i was deciding to get it or not, because i didn't want to miss this "thing" i was kinda paralyzed, it is my first time seeing one. (note: the sky was clear with no clouds all sides can be seen of the the sky) perfect for stargazing ;)

- it was yellow light, not flashing nor blinking, intense golden-yellow.

- this happened at 7:10pm (eastern time)

- the object was in a far distance from my house

- it had a straight track starting from south or south-east, then east, then north east and then north when it disappear.
content.summary: Yellow light on the sky (read the description for complete info)

content.detailedDescription: When i was younger, my brother and i shared the same bedroom and we had a bunk bed but i would sleep on the bottom with him. well our bed time was 9pm and it was around 9:30 and i still couldn't fall asleep, so i put my pellow at the other end of the bed. i layed there for a couple minutes and still couldn't fall asleep, so i sat up and i could see a little twinkle of light through the blinds. so i went to the window and looked at the light for a couple of minutes unitll i noticed it was getting higher off the horizon, so i knew now it wasn't a star. i thought it was a plane at first but as it came closer i began to see the shape of the aircraft. it was in the shape of a triangle, which was black, and it had 3 red flame-like lights on the the bottom of the craft at each corner and on the bottom it also had a slightly bigger white light in the center of the craft. the lights didn't flash or strobe, they were constant. i also noticed that it was moving to slow to be a airplane, especially when it was around 75ft to 100ft long and was only about 15ft to 20ft above the trees. so that wouldn't be physically possible for a airplane to do, because it was moving around 20mph. another strange thing is that it made no noise. and if it were to be a plane that big and that close to the ground i would have heard it. that's not all, so i watched to disappear over the house, so i got up and ran to the kitchen on the other side of the house to see it out the kitchen window but when i got there it was gone. either it took a 90 degree turn over our house or it sped up and was gone within about 10 seconds of me going to the kitchen from my room. and before it disappeared over the house i woke my brother up to show him, so if i were to tell him or anybody else, i would have some to back me up. well he looked out the window and said "ok wake me up when the aliens come", and then he fell back asleep. so i don't know if he saw it clearly or not because he was half asleep. i didn't tell my parent because i thought they would laugh at me and say it was only a dream or something like that. but i've been interested in ufo since then and when i saw your show i thought i could finally share my encounter. so i hope that it helps you figure out what they are, whether they're alien or human in origin.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Was a large triangular shape with red flame-like lights at each corner and a with a white one in the center.

content.detailedDescription:
At a canal festival.
looked up in the sky
ufo
black globe hovering not moving then vanished
stunned wiped my eyes in disbelief felt cold on a hot day heart rush feeling.
wiped my eyes.I told a friend three days later and he saw the same thing 
with a number of friends.
content.summary: Black globe five hundred foot up in sky or more

content.detailedDescription: In approx. 1975, maybe in the summertime, around 7:30 or 8:00 pm, traveling on hwy 53 near glen ellyn in illinois, i don't remember what direction we were heading, my husband at that time and i spotted something that looked like saturn.   it was a large, darkish metallic colored sphere with a luminous ring around it.  we saw others pulled over to the side of the road gazing at this. there must have been about 15 other people standing there. we pulled over as well and got out of the car and just watched it.   it stayed stationary for several minutes and then suddenly all of these little lights that looked like stars came out of the sphere and started darting all over the sky.  we were all amazed at this.   it went on like this for about 10 minutes and suddenly they all returned to the large sphere and the sphere ascended and zipped away and it was gone.    a newspaper article was written regarding the incident.  it was apparently observed by hundreds of people.  the article mentioned that the military bases around the area had no activity that night.    i remember seeing the news article in the chicago sun times.   i had tracked down the article at one time, but never purchased the archive.  i have always been surprised that this incident has never been mentioned on any of the ufo programs on tv.
content.summary: Saturn-like sphere hovered for several minutes with many little lights that came out of it and zipped all over the sky, then went back into sphere and it ascended rapidly and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On 4/27/15 while in my st. peters, missouri backyard messing around with a large kite which had been collecting dust in my garage for a few years.  i assembled it and went to the backyard for the fun of it.  about 3:00 pm the kite was not airborne but i noticed an airplane flying in the distance not sure of the altitude, the plane looked larger or as if it was flying lower than most i notice in the past.  what caught my attention as unusual was its course of south to north, typically i’m seeing east/west air traffic or vice versa. the other odd thing was the contrail, it was large and appeared to be sputtering or leaving puff rings, then a wave, then rings another wave on and on. i looked more closely at the body of the plane it appeared more white then metallic as it passes overhead and to my east. also odd was that the wings were not pulled back; they were straighter off each side of the body. this plane made a turn to the northeast but i could watch it getting smaller in the distance still leaving the trail. within a few minutes around 3:10 pm, i saw another similar airplane, white underside, straight wings which was was coming from the northeast and heading to the southwest .This second airplane was also leaving an odd contrail of straight line, then puffs, no wave like the first. the contrail of the second plane stopped as it approached the first contrail. the sun is out, blue skys, very slight clouds, i’m standing in my yard, looking immediately east the second “plane” was at about 2 o’clock position in the sky when was about to intersect the first contrail, it stopped emitting it’s contrail, it did not break the first contrail which was expanding in width.  at about 3 o’clock position the second plane appeared to turn into a cigar shape! grayer in color than previously white, within a second, each end turned silver or flashed and it vanished. this wasn’t an airplane changing its course or if it did, it turned on a dime and must have went immediately south and out of my eyesight.  nothing fell towards the earth, no smoke, just gone. after a minute or two of looking south, i went to the front yard to tell my wife who was working in the flower bed. as we stood looking at the contrails both merged and at about 3:20 pm they were forming a cloud drifting east/north east direction. i put the kite away. looked on the internet and found this site.
content.summary: Silent airplane leaving contrail turned into silvel cigar shape then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10pm on 04/26, i stepped out on my patio.  as always, i look up in the sky to check out the weather.  if i didn't look exactly where the object was, i would have missed it.  it was a dark, gunmetal grey boomerang shaped object and flew directly over my condo unit from east to west.  i first noticed it heading directly towards me from the east about 1 mile.  it took all of 10-15 seconds before it flew directly over me and out of sight.  my heart was racing.  
i've always been interested in ufos and i'm certain they exist.  i've always wanted to see one, until i actually saw one.  
i felt this overwhelming dreamlike sensation that i was being noticed as i was watching the craft.  i felt as if i kept looking at it, it would stop and come around. to try to further explain, i've had dreams before where i saw a tornado and i just "knew" it was going to come towards me, and it does.  it's almost the exact same feeling i had.  i can't say anymore about this other than i always thought i'd be excited to see one, but in fact, it was terrifying.  if the government is covering it up, i think i know why now.  it's horrific to see something like this.

most importantly...If you had any reports of the same object, i'd really like to know so i know i'm not the only one who saw this.
thanks,
{witness name removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Boomerang shaped object seen flying east to west
